meanings.definition: Cause (a machine or device) to operate.
meanings.sent1: Pressing the button actuates the toy robot to move forward.
meanings.sent2: The key actuates the engine, starting the car.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat actuates the automatic feeder to dispense extra treats.
meanings.sent4: His speech actuates a wave of excitement among the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight actuates the solar panels, generating electricity for the house.

meanings.definition: Motivate or incite (someone) to do something.
meanings.sent1: Her success story actuates others to pursue their dreams.
meanings.sent2: The coach's pep talk actuates the team to give their best performance.
meanings.sent3: The promise of a reward actuates the students to complete their assignments on time.
meanings.sent4: The inspiring movie actuates viewers to make positive changes in their lives.
meanings.sent5: The supportive community actuates individuals to volunteer for a good cause.
